module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This Report allows you to profile and score a users virtual desktop session. A user experience score of 1 (lowest) - 5 (highest) is assigned to various the various components monitored as part of that VDI session. To get started, enter a username, desktop hostname and select a time range below.

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` `xa_ica` InputSessionBandwidth OutputSessionBandwidth LatencySessionAverage InputSessionCompression OutputSessionCompression UserName!="" user!="_Server Total" [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name user ] | eval SessionBandwidth=InputSessionBandwidth+OutputSessionBandwidth | search SessionBandwidth>0 | timechart span=5m max(SessionBandwidth) as MaxSessionBandwidth min(SessionBandwidth) as MinSessionBandwidth median(SessionBandwidth) as "AvgSessionBandwidth" Max(LatencySessionAverage) as "LatencySessionAverage" | eval AvgSessionBandwidth = round(AvgSessionBandwidth,2) | where MaxSessionBandwidth>0 | sort - _time

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats avg(AvgSessionBandwidth) as SessionBandwidth | eval SessionBandwidth = round(SessionBandwidth,2) | `usrexp_icabw` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats median(LatencySessionAverage) as LatencySessionAverage | eval LatencySessionAverage = round(LatencySessionAverage,2) | `usrexp_icalatency` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | head 1 | lookup xa_servers vm_name OUTPUT DesktopGroupName HostingServerName CatalogName ControllerDNSName | fillnull DesktopGroupName HostingServerName CatalogName ControllerDNSName value="Unknown" | eval c_type = substr(DeviceId,0,3) | eval client_dvc_type = case(c_type == "iOS", "Apple iOS",c_type == "iPa", "iPad",c_type == "roi", "Android",c_type == "WI_","Windows Desktop Receiver",DeviceId == ClientName,"Desktop Receiver") | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" mktime(StartTime) as st | eval dur = _time - st | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" mktime(BrokeringTime) as bt | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" mktime(SessionStateChangeTime) as sest | eval load_time = sest - bt | eval load_time=if(SessionState=="Active",load_time,0) | fillnull load_time | rename dur as Duration| rename client_dvc_type as EndpointType | rename load_time as LoadTime | head 1 | table SessionState SessionStateChangeTime StartTime Duration LoadTime UserName ClientName EndpointType ClientAddress Protocol ClientVersion LaunchedViaIP ConnectedViaIP | transpose

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` `xd5_desktops_sourcetype` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ]| head 1 | table MachineName PowerState InMaintenanceMode DesktopGroupName CatalogName OSType IPAddress AgentVersion HostingServerName HypervisorConnectionName HostedMachineName LastDeregistrationReason LastDeregistrationTime LastDeregistrationReason | transpose

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_cpu` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | stats last(Value) as Value by _time vm_name

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | timechart max(Value) as "Max % CPU" avg(Value) as "Avg % CPU" min(Value) as "Min % CPU"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats median(Value) as Value | eval Value=round(Value,2) | `usrexp_cpu`| eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `perfmon_mem` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | stats first(Value) as Value by _time vm_name

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | eval Value=Value/1024/1024 | timechart max(Value) as MaxMBFree avg(Value) as AvgMBFree min(Value) as MinMBFree | eval MaxMBFree= round(MaxMBFree,2) | eval AvgMBFree= round(AvgMBFree,2) | eval MinMBFree= round(MinMBFree,2)

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | eval Value=Value/1024/1024 | stats median(Value) as Value | eval Value=round(Value,2) | `usrexp_mem`| eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: counter="Disk Transfers/Sec" `perfmon_logdisk` object=LogicalDisk [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | stats first(Value) as Value by _time vm_name

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | timechart max(Value) as max avg(Value) as avg min(Value) as min | eval avg = round(avg,2) | eval max = round(max,2) | eval min = round(min,2) | rename min as "Min Disk Transfers/Sec" | rename max as "Max Disk Transfers/Sec" | rename avg as "Avg Disk Transfers/Sec"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | stats median(Value) as Value | eval Value=round(Value,2) | `usrexp_io`| eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `win_index` Type=Error sourcetype="WinEventLog:*" [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] |stats values(SourceName) as "Source(s)" values(Message) as "Message(s)" by Type vm_name | head 10 | sort - count

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | head 1 | eval Report="View Installed Applications" | stats first(Report) as Report by vm_name

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `win_index` sourcetype="wmi:installedsoftware" application_name!="----" earliest=-7d $vm_name$ | stats first(Version) as Version by Vendor Name

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | head 1 | eval Report="View Running Processes" | stats first(Report) as Report by vm_name

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: $vm_name$ `perfmon_process` | table vm_name process_name Value counter instance | eval mem = if(counter=="Virtual Bytes",Value,"") | eval cpu = if(counter=="% Processor Time",Value,"") | eval ioread = if(counter="IO Read Operations/sec",Value,"") | eval iowrite = if(counter="IO Write Operations/sec",Value,"")

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `xenapp_index` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $vm_name$ | stats first(vm_name) as vm_name by user | head 1 | fields + vm_name ] | head 1 | eval Report="View Bios" | stats first(Report) as Report by vm_name

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: `win_index` sourcetype=WMI:Win32BIOS $vm_name$ earliest=-180d | head 1 | table BIOSVersion BiosCharacteristics BuildNumber Caption CodeSet CurrentLanguage Description IdentificationCode InstallDate InstallableLanguages LanguageEdition ListOfLanguages Manufacturer Message Name OtherTargetOS PrimaryBIOS ReleaseDate SMBIOSBIOSVersion SMBIOSMajorVersion SMBIOSMinorVersion SMBIOSPresent SerialNumber SoftwareElementID SoftwareElementState Status TargetOperatingSystem Version wmi_type | transpose
